channel.title: WPOT POT RADIO WORLD WIDE
channel.description: Hard Rock Radio and bands that you will never hear on US air waves. Kick ass music with dark humor to keep your buzz going while you rock your ass off with WPOT ! Come on & download one of our many playlist's and let Pot Radio smoke your mind.
channel.itunes:subtitle: 50 million Terabytes of Hard Rock Radio & Digital Drug Buzz

item.title: NEW WPOT PLAYLIST for JULY
item.description:
Look at all the "Drug Users". Are you waiting on the new WPOT playlist? The new playlist download is a mix of old & new bands, some you will know and others you'll never hear anywhere except for right here on WPOT. Download it and listen to the songs and tell us what songs are worth ripp'n or worth flush'n! Now turn it up till your ears burn & hurt and fire up your skunk nugz while you rock yer ass off!

Enjoy and write to us anytime & send us your thoughts!

Give us yer mind & we will ........ !

rgwinn@mail.com

item.title: WPOT Cover Song Playlist
item.description:
Greetings to all you dope stars. I have a skunk buded treat for you all in the form of a playlist that is all Cover songs by metal & hard rock bands from past to present. I know some of you drug users cant stand to hear your favorite songs butchered or done by any other artist. Well I can say that every song on the playlist will make you think, smoke more and or piss you off at the world. Have fun trying to guess who's whom and enjoy a playlist that's off the normal.

And hey, if ya dont care for it, you can always listen to rap or ska and really do some biblical brain damage or just go be really bored and be a full blown tool because of a cover tune. So fire up a skunky nug and crank up those little computer speakers and take it all in till you get that puke feeling !

Let us know if you got through it with out any anal seepage or side effects...

rgwinn@mail.com

item.title: New WPOT Playlist June 2011
item.description:
Here's a new playlist for you Grass huff'n Rockers to download and get stoned as a goat as you kill your hearing and blow those little computer speakers with.

There's some new bands that you've never heard and and old remastered classic & covers that I know you will consume with a bong stained grin.

Email us rgwinn@mail.com

item.title: WPOT POT RADIO NEW PLAYLIST
item.description:
Here ya go big Druggies!! An All New WPOT Pot Radio Podcast is ready for your download as of 32011. So Download it and give it to the little drugies and they shall rock out and future drugs will be handed to every hippie rock'n out! Hard Rock'n bands from Atlanta to Atlantis... Hear the Radio as it should be & THC pumped into your head by listening to our signal !

Try it !

Pot Radio WW
